Subjects: scripture, Engl. trans. of; advice, spiritual; translations; fornication
_description: Avoid fornication — one couplet translating ‘Abstineatis vos ab omni fornicatione’ (1 Thess. 4.3) which precedes it in John Grimestone’s sermon notebook
